articles.title: Utilising the power of ghee for post-pregnancy weight loss - The Indian Express
articles.description: Utilising the power of ghee for post-pregnancy weight loss
articles.content: Ghee aids in the absorption of fat-soluble vitamins (D, A, E, and K), which are essential for bone health, immunity, and hormonal balance.
